sentences.sentence: Heidi rapturously exclaimed: "Oh, Clara, can you really?"
sentences.translation: 海蒂兴高采烈地喊道：“哦，克拉拉，你真的能吗？”

sentences.sentence: "My dear, dear aunt," she rapturously cried, "what delight!" What felicity!
sentences.translation: “我的好舅母，亲舅母，”她欢天喜地叫了起来，“多高兴，多幸福！”

sentences.sentence: Even people who have not yet read the novel will find the film rapturously engaging.
sentences.translation: 人们即便没有读过小说，也会发现这部电影极引人入胜。
